page.title: 12 WHIPPET RACING-KILLINGWORTH
page.content: Puppies are chosen at 6 weeks old and will be kept in a bed with warm straw or shredded paper.They should be fed 4 times a day because they are growing quickly.Two times a day the meal should be cereal with milk and no sugar and the other twshould have liver and meat mixed with meal,which has all the vitamins and minerals in it.The meat and meal should be soaked in hot gravy. After the meal the puppy should have a drink,probably water and milk mixed. When the puppy is settled in,the owner can try teasing the puppy with an old rag.Hopefully the puppy will catch hold of the rag and start shaking it violently.This means he is getting interested.The next stage is to tie a piece of string to the rag and pull it round the garden,so the puppy gets keener at chasing it every day. continued:PAGE 13.
